website_summaries.verdict: This window vac cuts window cleaning time while boosting effectiveness. Its impressive telescopic extensions and larger dirty water capacity get the job done, and quickly.
pros: This vac's reach adjusts from 10" to 40" with telescopic extensions
Includes squeegee, sponge, and spray bottle
cons: May spill water if you accidentally turn it upside down

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on prime day to give to our daughter for her apartment. I decided to check in out before we gave it to her. I put it together and honestly thought that it didn't look like it would work well at all. I was wrong. This little guy has incredible suction and I was really blown away by how well it worked and love the fact that in seconds you can use it as a hand vacuum. Long story short. We are keeping it! Great to clean up after our Toy Aussies. For the size a very impressive product.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Elder

customer_reviews.title: READ CAREFULLY AND ASK ABOUT CLEANING CUP USE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little cleaner - gets into tiny spaces and under low furniture, is very easy to handle and assemble. However, there is false advertising here - says machine is equipped with a removable and washable cleaning cup - this is not true. The machine we received has an UNremovable and UNwashable cleaning cup, and bunches up with pet hair after the third or fourth use. It is now of no use to us and we and we believe several other buyers have complained about the same cleanup issue. We have asked for a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: pussycat

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture.
customer_reviews.text: I'm leaving a 3 star review because it does not work well on carpets, they should not advertise it as a carpet cleaner/vacuum because it is not. The design is great though and it works really good on hardwood floors, and other hard surfaces I would try another product from this brand because it seemed well built and it functioned really well on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: iReview

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and portable
customer_reviews.text: Decent, small, portable, and affordable vacuum unit. For the price it does what it is designed to do, but I suppose without brushes on the carpet attachment it has a difficult time picking up the larger pieces of debris on my area rugs. One annoyance though is the filter can be tough to remove when emptying, which resulted in all the dust particles it sucked up t be released inside. Best to remove the filter outside a window or in a room where the dust won't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Grunt 117

customer_reviews.title: If anyone is considering this product to clean carpet floors, look for other options.
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is considering this product to clean carpet floors, look for other options. I was hoping this would still do the job of picking up hair on my carpeted floor, but this just does not do. I've had it for two months, and even though the suction is good enough for hard floors, it really does not work on carpet floors. I have to try three+ times to pick up visible debris on my carpet. I'm keeping the vacuum just because I was too lazy to return it and it works for hard floors, but I'm currently looking at other vacuums to buy. Don't waste money on this product if you have carpeted floors!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Choi

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER ONE USE
customer_reviews.text: This is the first review I’ve ever written on a product. I wish it could be a good one. Unfortunately, this product stopped working after one (1) use. When I requested they replace the unit, I was sent a unit that was clearly previously used and returned because that owner apparently no longer wanted it. I’m very disappointed. I had high hopes for this product. It makes me wonder if the prior positive reviews were paid for or if I was just unlucky BOTH times...
customer_reviews.author: Lael A. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: NO POWER
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolute trash. It is a glorified hand vacuum with a cheap handle slapped on it. It has absolutely ZERO suction power and when it does pick up small things, it has to be emptied every 30 seconds. I have hardwood floors and bought this for a few small area rugs. It took me over 20 minutes to finish ONE 6'x4' rug. Returning today
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 3 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in literally 3 minutes! Tried a few times..but the motor just doesn't turn on now..this was my second attempt at getting a decent corded vacuum cleaner..
customer_reviews.author: Chetan

customer_reviews.title: didn't realize this is a hand vac with a floor ...
customer_reviews.text: didn't realize this is a hand vac with a floor attachment... thing is so small and doesn't pick up jack squat. ugh
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Bullitt

customer_reviews.title: great suction, vac for my 90 yr
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lightweight, great suction, vac for my 90 yr. old mother who can't haul around her lg vac anymore. It allows for easy storage, quick in/out of her closet and plenty of suction for her bare floors. It also provides a quick once over around the kitchen table which sits on carpet. It easily goes under the lip of kitchen cupboards, over rugs and grabs anything in front or to the sides. Improvement ideas: I wish the cord was another 5' longer and there was a place ON the machine to hook the two auxiliary pieces that come with it. Good product and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one great vacuum, its comes apart when i need a hand vacuum for my car, and when i need to vacuum my home it can be a standing vacuum. Great suction! gets even glitter up! Light weight to lift and slim to store. All in all a great vacuum!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan-marie Franco

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like about this vacuum is the way the floor part ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this vacuum is the way the floor part attached to the dustbuster part. It is a loose connection, and when I say loose, I mean when you lift up the vacuum the floor part stays on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa DeRonne

customer_reviews.title: Works great for any light work, no fuss. Compact, takes up little space
customer_reviews.text: Works surprisingly well and meets all the needs I intended for this product. I have a long haired cat and hardwood flooring throughout the house. So there's bundles and clumps of cat hair floating around often. I just needed a vacuum to make cleaning this up easily. Not heavy like a normal vacuum which I would prefer for heavier duty work. Just a light efficient device to whip out quickly, with little or no fuss. My only complaint is that the cord could stand to be a few feet longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lackinginterest

customer_reviews.title: It’s a toss up?
customer_reviews.text: Basically it is a glorified dust buster with a floor attachment. Extremely easy to put together,and light weight. Easy to use from a walker or wheelchair. It is a good little unit if you only need light cleaning, as the suction is minimal at best with the floor attachment. But take that off and add the crevice attachment and it is great. On cushions , under the cushions and in the car, it’s great. Just don’t get it for heavy cleaning cause it won’t do it.
customer_reviews.author: Coverkid

customer_reviews.title: BESTEK Corded Stick Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This has a lot of suction and works well. The pointy attachment allows for tight spaces such as in the spaces in between the sofa cushions and along sliding glass door rails or windows. I love that it is so lightweight I can easily pick it up and over a sled-bottomed chair to vacuum inside that area. It picks up hairs and dirt with ease. It is good on wood or vinyl flooring when using the attachment. Cord could be longer, but I now attach an extension to it.
customer_reviews.author: CatMac

customer_reviews.title: The con is that I was sorely disappointed when I felt how light and cheap feeling it ...
customer_reviews.text: The con is that I was sorely disappointed when I felt how light and cheap feeling it is. But then again, I paid three times more for the one I'm replacing that is heavier duty. There are some things I like, it turns out. The lightness makes it great for cleaning stairs, especially stairs with no carpet. It is also easy to clean the basket. And for such a light-weight product, it does pick up pretty well. I keep it downstairs in my workshop and I do like it for that. I will purchase a more expensive one for my other needs.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum does a great job of sucking up dog hair from our laminate ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does a great job of sucking up dog hair from our laminate floor. It is much easier to use than my heavy upright (although my upright does an excellent job on our carpets whereas this vacuum is horrible on carpets). Easy to empty out as well. I just wish the cord was a couple feet longer because I have to switch outlets just to reach the farthest edge of my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh I guess you get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: It's just ok.. takes forever to vacuum a rug, especially my persian rug, I have to really go over it quite a few times to get it clean. I wouldn't even say its good. Usually vacuuming for me is fun but with this contraption it just feels like labor.Wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Nina L.

customer_reviews.title: It handles a small upstairs bedroom easily without dragging heavier vacuum upstairs.
customer_reviews.text: This stick vaccum was easy to assemble, has great suction and was easy to clean. I used it on the bedroom carpet and it worked great. It is lightweight and all plastic. It does not seem as durable as larger vacuums. But, I think if it is handled with care it will last.
customer_reviews.author: N. Butler

customer_reviews.title: it works great but not good for carpet
customer_reviews.text: Is okay, bought to vacuum my hardwood floor and it does the job and is lightweight. Also read a review about it vacuuming carpet well, and I have to say I disagree. While it gets the big chunks, it does not get deep into the carpet to get it really clean so if you’re looking for something to get chunks up then it works great but as far as getting it really clean it does not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: When I first put it together, I thought about how quickly I’d return it. It just seemed so flimsy. Then I put it to use. I turned it on and vacuumed over my area rug. I couldn’t believe how much dirt and dog hair it sucked up! The rig looked brand new. Soon, I found myself using it all over the house - laminate flooring - and I couldn’t be happier. It’s small and easy to use. The fact that it converts to a handheld makes it even better. What a value!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Needs replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this little vacuum! When it arrived, I was surprised by how small and light it was. It looks like a kids' toy! But the suction is awesome, and it's so easy to move/handle. It does need to be emptied often because of its small size. My only complaint is that the company needs to make some replacement filters and extra attachments that can be sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: kelley

customer_reviews.title: I like it! It did work well and cleaned small ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it! It did work well and cleaned small part that is difficult to clean, and it's not that loud to scare my baby. It's very easy to use even i didn't need to read instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces for hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I live in a 300 sq ft studio apartment. I have no pets so I don't know how this fares with fur. I do know that this is cheap and has very good suction. There's no brush so it literally just sucks. There's no hose but you can pop off the handle and nozzle and it turns into a hand vacuum. It's tiny and cheap and perfect for dorm rooms, or NYC bachelor pads. This isn't great for high pile or shag rugs.
customer_reviews.author: leed

customer_reviews.title: I am EXTREMELY happy with this little vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This little thing.... when I opened the box I said to myself... wow I lost my money here, because it looks too simple...... BUT then.....This little thing really showed me how wrong I was .... It works and has a power that I was not expecting at all..... I am EXTREMELY happy with this little vacuum cleaner. It does a very good job and is portable too. Good job guys.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this thing! I was a bit nervous never having heard of them, but it's very sturdy, excellent quality and great cleaning power. Blows away the light-weight Dirt Devil and Shark vacuums! I own the lightweight Oreck at 5.5 lbs, but this is even lighter for her for quick cleanups, especially animal hair on our tile floors...Extremely pleased ;)
customer_reviews.author: The Renovation Guru

customer_reviews.title: Good suction power!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the amount of suction this little thing has. It's light weight so my arm doesn't get tired. The end is easy to remove in order to use the attachment to get into corners, behind the toilet and on the baseboards. Works good on tile. I have no complaints. Big value for a little price. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne F

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucks (not in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: Not a great vacuum. Worked fine for the first 2 weeks then broke down. I have a thicker carpet than usual at my place so that gave it some trouble I guess. A vacuum this cheap isn't going to really last long, save your money and invest in a better quality vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good at cleaning but Too fragile! It just broke!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 3 months ago, and normally use it once a week. It is small and easy to carry. Good at cleaning on its lower price. Today I leaned it to the wall and it just fell and broke the plastic part on its back. So problem happened. It just fell apart - the handle and the vacuum part were separated and there is no way to fix the problem. Except buying a new one - Please tell me what to do. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MasamiGo

customer_reviews.title: great stick vacuum for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Super-lightweight and easy to use. Powerful suction allows it to genuinely clean floors unlike some stick vacuums/dust busters. Excellent build quality and value for the money. Cons: Cord is very short, so you'll probably be outlet hopping. It's so lightweight that it's easy for this to slides around when trying to vacuum in a back-and-forth motion on smooth floors. It has 2 filters, but probably not HEPA compliant.
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable vacuum cleaner, zero customer service - A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It was a waste of money buying this vacuum cleaner. It lasted less than 6 months. After 5 months, it started to make weird sound everytime I used it and it did not pick up anything off the floor and carpet. I sent a message to Bestek about this but received no reply at all. A complete waste of time and money. It turns out that by buying this vacuum cleaner it cost me even more because now I need to buy a new one. This time I will buy a more reliable brand, such as Black & Decker. No more Bestek.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lam

customer_reviews.title: Love This Little Guy
customer_reviews.text: In combination with the carpet rake purchased on Amazon for $15, this little vacuum is all I need to keep my hideous carpet under control. This model is so easy, so lightweight, so quiet - it takes the horror out of housework. It's not even loud enough to scare the cat! The adjustments switch out with ease, so I'm not procrastinating the cobwebs in the corners or the crumbs along the baseboards anymore, and it is small enough to catch all those narrow places with ease. I have never loved a vacuum before. And the price? SOLD.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C. DeForest

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get filter really clean.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It works well. I got it for daily clean up after my birds. It cleans up the feathers and bird seed well. However I have found that I cannot get the filter clean. I finally cleaned the filter with my regular vacuum cleaner pretty much cancelling out the whole reason I got the thing. It probably has a lot to do with the fact that it is hard to clean bird feathers from anything.
customer_reviews.author: Julia E. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This little vac isnt going to be a powerhouse, but it picks up pretty well. The best thing is my 6 year old and grab it and clean up his own messes. It weighs next to nothing and took me literally 60 seconds to put together. Perfect for spot cleaning and grabbing cob webs and dust out from under furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love the vacuum. It picked up well especially good for if you have cats to pick up litter and hair. Unlike other vacuums it doesn't shoot backwards it suck everyrhig right up. Cord is a bit small but I don't mind at all. It's very light weight and can come apart to do stairs
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. It's not amazing, but it works better than the $150 vacuum I just bought (and am returning). Does the job. Better on hard surfaces than low-pile rug.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Good Job Keeping Up
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use in my RV- which we are living in while remodeling the house- so I use it daily. Two people and 2 big dogs (and the occasional 4 yr old) it seems to keep up real well- but you must clean it each time you use it or I can see the filter getting clogged fast. Great tool for the price
customer_reviews.author: Aron Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me! Lightweight, I can easily carry it upstairs. It's perfect for everyday elimination of cat hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh—when I opened up this vacuum I almost returned it right away because it doesn’t look very powerful and is so light weight but.. what a great vacuum! Can’t believe how well it worked on my wood floors and carpet. Even better than my big, heavy vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Cdh

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This petite vacuum is a real asset to smooth flooring - vinyl, tile, pergo, hardwood - I've used it on all of them and it does a terrific job. Another plus: it's lightweight and so is much easier to use for quick cleanups. I even leave it plugged in to whip through my kitchen. It does NOT, however, work well on most rugs or carpet, at least not in my experience. But I have recommended it to quite a few folks and will continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: mikeyt

customer_reviews.title: Great product - design and function.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to open & put together. Great for particles of cat litter scattered on rug, also for bits & pieces of dry cat food. I can use this daily. Very well designed. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nanafairie

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our office area and I am surprised by how well it works for a small vacuum. It's great for a quick pickup around the desks and the detachable hand held vacuum works well too. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schulz

customer_reviews.title: BESTEK Corded Stick Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: For the money is a best value or so. It feels fragile, I don't know because it hasn't bumped into anything as yet and will try not to. The suction power is not too good, like a notch bellow ok. but I feel that for the money it is ok. I would prefer to pay an extra 10.00 and have a more powerful suction motor. Another thing, the wheel don't move as easy as it should. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Reever

customer_reviews.title: HEPA not what it should be
customer_reviews.text: I was especially interested in the HEPA filter. I wanted a vacuum that would not put dust out around the house. I have allergies. However, that part did not work, so I returned it. As a straight vacuum it's OK. Has great suction and can be used as a dustbuster.
customer_reviews.author: Ivory

customer_reviews.title: Great little vac with powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum cleaner. It has a lot of suction for a lightweight stick vacuum. I bought it mostly because I have a large heavy Shark vacuum and it is difficult for me to maneuver. I have mostly hardwood floors but it also works well on my area rug in the living room. I haven't used as a hand vac yet but it seems really easy to convert. I would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: rnminty

customer_reviews.title: very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: we just had laminate flooring installed. You cannot really use vacuums with rollers on laminate and that is why this little vacuum is perfect....no roller. I would not buy for carpeting but for hardwood and the handheld with crevice tool ...it is perfect
customer_reviews.author: jim in the bronx

customer_reviews.title: This works perfect for my one bedroom apartment
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight yet picks up a lot!!!! This works perfect for my one bedroom apartment. I even use it to vacuum my couch because it is very light to lift. Easy to clean out the filter as well. Works great sucking up all the cat hair and litter on my laminate floors too.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Deal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 4 both of my houses I have one room in my parents house and a small apartment and in both this vacuum is absolutely amazing for the price and it has a HEPA filter and that is the only kind of vacuum I will purchase they are generally expensive you can't beat this deal. I don't have any stairs so I can't comment on that but I do have hardwood floors and carpet and it works great with my two cats.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: NO POWER!
customer_reviews.text: No suction, leaves all hair right on top of carpet. Debri collects in one spot on filter. Itz what I get for buying off-brand. Not as good as my Bissell PowerSwift. Spend more $ & get quality merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Josleyn

customer_reviews.title: It's a good vacuum, not great
customer_reviews.text: It's a good vacuum, not great. But for $40 it meets my expectations. It's very light, one of its good features, and so far seems able to pick up most household dust and such. I'm not sure it will pick up built in stuff in carpets, but I don't think it advertises itself as able to do that. For light housekeeping it seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: jazz99

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a stick vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Best little vacuum ever! Works better than some regular sized vacuums. Suction is strong! I even have a puppy baby and it is GREAT AT GETTING SHORT FUR. Remove attachment and it gets around base boards/ bed frames/ furniture. You do have to clean / dump filter often, but hey it’s a small vacuum it what I expected. If you want heavy duty cleaning GET A HEAVY DUTY VACUUM. I’m extremely pleased with this. I got it for Christmas and I use it (high traffic areas) daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on floors though
customer_reviews.text: Not powerful enough for carpet. Works great on floors though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than a broom and dust pan
customer_reviews.text: Better than a broom and dust pan! When sweeping up dog hair, you never get it all. The hairs flying around are settling back on the floor as you sweep into the dust pan. I absolutely love this thing! Gets all hair. No fly away dog hairs resettling. Gets into spots you can't usually sweep. Great buy! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Denise M. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great for bare floors not area rugs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's dorm room to clean his large area rug. It didn't pick up a thing. Works fine for the tile floor. I would return it but my son threw away the box and paperwork. This was my 2nd attempt with a stick vacuum. The reviews seemed so promising.
customer_reviews.author: Msilly

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It is good for vacuuming floors not as good for carpet it will still pick up lots of dust from your carpet but it will not pick up heavier stuff like a regular vacuum cleaner Like for example small rocks or so it is still quite powerful considering it is so small and it looks like a toy Vacuum cleaner it still has good suction Power
customer_reviews.author: Dafnae Anaid Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my BESTEK
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small but strong vacuum that was capable of vacuuming up sand on my wood floor. This was it. It also has an attachment that I use to get the sand out of the sliding door track. It really does an amazing job for such a small and light weight machine. It's just perfect for our beach house.
customer_reviews.author: penny rich

customer_reviews.title: Gets The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: As cheap as this is, it works surprisingly well. My $60 dirt devil can't even pick up powered carpet freshener. I have a cat and I knew I had his fur in my carpet but I didn't think of how much dirt was in there too. I'm so glad I don't have to sweep the carpet anymore. Using this on floors is pretty okay too. Easy to assemble but I don't think I'd recommend to anyone with a lot of carpet. It is a cheap vacuum after all so I'm skeptical on how long it'll last. Hopefully it stays with me.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Nice little light vacuum works good
customer_reviews.text: Even though you can clean the filter-Company says they don't have replacement filters-- in time the filters get worn out. Company says they are working on though. Nice little light vacuum works good. More power that I thought taking out of the box. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and powerful for a small vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and powerful for a small vacuum. Use on bare floors and rugs. The filter and collection cup require a quick rinse after use. Overall very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Nice light vacuum, good for cleaning hard to reach areas. Works on hard wood floors too.
customer_reviews.author: John Behring

customer_reviews.title: Product does what it says. Very strong suction on ...
customer_reviews.text: Product does what it says. Very strong suction on wood floors, not so much on carpet. Small collection bin, but this is a very light and convenient tool. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Teachair

customer_reviews.title: Great stick vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, cleans well. I loved the fact that it stands on it's own. It is replacing a Featherweight Bissell that I had for 10+ years. I loved my Bissell but because Bestek stands on it's own it is much better. While vacuuming you have to stop to move things and not having to lean the vacuum on a wall or lay it down saves a lot of time and energy. The wheels are larger as well so it is much easier to push around.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Bon

customer_reviews.title: Powerful,Small, and Easy to Maneuver
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is really powerful and great for small apartments with limited storage. This is also great for people that need something light and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for small apartment
customer_reviews.text: A very lightweight, compact vacuum cleaner that is ideal for my new, small apartment. I have limited storage and it fits superbly in my closet. Also, the filter caught cat hair that my older, larger vac missed!
customer_reviews.author: MJZ

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use it upside down!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully! Just don’t turn it upside down! Unfortunately it will spill! Some spaces require it to be turned...
customer_reviews.author: MnM

customer_reviews.title: Best small vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best small vacuum I’ve ever bought! I bought one for our camper and ended up buying one for our house. The compactness of the vacuum is fantastic for vacuuming steps. The suction is really strong. It does ok on carpet. There are no brisles to pull things off the carpet but the suction is strong enough to pull up a decent amount off carpet. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kazmierczak

customer_reviews.title: So powerful and easy to store since it’s so small
customer_reviews.text: So powerful and easy to store since it’s so small. I use it for the bathroom and the kitchen and it picks up all the little trash. I can do this easily on the carpet too so lightweight and easy to do!! Highly recommend for those living in an apartment not wanting a big vacuum with a belt that always comes out. Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Sheliza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my need!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a light duty vac, I am very satisfied with this product. It's very light weight, and has enough power for a light job. Only reason for giving 4 stars, I have not used this product for a long time to make sure of durability.
customer_reviews.author: Simon C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Hand Vac
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little hand held vac. It was easy to assemble and works fabulously. The suction is great, works well on the hardwood, tile, and carpeted floors. Great vac for small space and easy to store. I have bought hand vans before but this one is clearly the best.
customer_reviews.author: C White

customer_reviews.title: ... vacume a few times since I got it but love the suction and easy conversion from one use to ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used this vacume a few times since I got it but love the suction and easy conversion from one use to another of it. It has filled my need to vacume in hard toget places very well.
customer_reviews.author: Betty A.

customer_reviews.title: Great For Quick Small Messes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to clean up the little messes quickly. The suction on the vacuum head attachment isn't all that strong, but for quick and easy spot cleaning it does the trick and it's easy to use and stow away.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Brosnan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a month and love it. Compared to my last one, it's much lighter-weight and thus easier to handle, has way more suction, and has a larger dust cup and better filter. It's wonderful on my wood floors. Only two minor complaints: I would like a wider floor nozzle and a longer cord. It's not great on rugs, but I don't need that and didn't expect it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Linch

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight -easy to grab and use.!!
customer_reviews.text: Its lightweight - goes from carpet to floor......easy to unhook and use the hand held unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Lee

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight yes. Effective, I'd say so so. It picks up what it wants. I wouldn't recommend use on tall carpet. A good sweep and this to finish off a hardwood or tile floor and that's a wrap. For the price, I guess it is what u get for it.
customer_reviews.author: Don Skey

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: It's excellent but the plastic is a little delicate in some areas. You need to use with carefully! Perfect for the price! The suction is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Katty

customer_reviews.title: Worth to buy, does its job
customer_reviews.text: The pros : strong power, light weight, long cord , now my son can help me vacuum the floor, I haven't used it on the carpet, not sure the result, but the result was so good on the hard wood floor, pick up dust and hair so quick, don't waste money to buy the heavy vacuum, this one does its job, I recommend everyone should have one at home.
customer_reviews.author: LBZ

customer_reviews.title: ... so powerful and yet lightweight that it makes vacuuming fun. I used to hate pushing around my heavier ...
customer_reviews.text: This stick vacuum is so powerful and yet lightweight that it makes vacuuming fun. I used to hate pushing around my heavier vacuum so I didn't use it very often. When I received this Bestek I was cleaning up small pieces of sawdust and debris from my husband's project every day and didn't mind a bit. It was easy to take apart and clean out the filter (wish it was a bigger filter) and presto I was ready for another day!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Squires

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's very light weight .I was so surprised this little vacuum really picks up.When I first opened it .Thought there wasn't much to it Takes about 30 seconds to put together..I love it ...when I went and checked to see how much . dirt was in the container .I was stunned .I give this a five star .
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love this Vaccum cleaner. This can handle our german shpherd's fur and hasn't broke down after 6 months of use so far. Lightweight and compact, it also comes with a long plug.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Stick Vac
customer_reviews.text: Great Suction. Perfect if you have pets you need to zoom vacuum over daily. Found it in Good Housekeeping by chance after I bought it, also highly rated.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: Not much pull power, no brush on pickup end, so only really good on hard surfaces. Worked "sorta" on a throw rug, carpet not so good. Pet hair, can't get it up, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Machanic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Office
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect vacuum for my office! It get under furniture, and I love that it becomes a hand held vac with an attachment for the hard to reach areas. Great little machine so far!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Mark

customer_reviews.title: Easy perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for the sole purpose of picking up particulates and dust from a hardwood floor. I also wanted something lightweight and easy to maneuver. Even with such a low price, this product is spectacular. It does the job in no time at all and I can lift it with one finger on one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light vacuum stick
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good lightweight vacuum, and with the HEPA filter it doesn’t just blow dirt around. Excellent if you have hardwood or tile floors, does ok with rugs. I wish I had found this three vacuums ago.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Mears

customer_reviews.title: Does the job !
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks up efficiently condensation which forms on my windows in my RV. Product well made!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Blad

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sucks up everything it’s strong I really like it
customer_reviews.author: J. Church

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: There is only one plastic pole to use with both the sprayer & suction part. It's exhausting going back & forth. Worked with it a bit trying different ways to get it to work. Too many streaks, even though I used a special cleaner designed for squeegees. Got the best results doing it the old fashioned way. Total bummer!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ20paws

customer_reviews.title: Poor product!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this product! Used it once after a full charge and then it stopped working!
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to assemble, easy to use, easy to store, light weight, and does a great job of picking things up on either carpeting or hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Bahli

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Very strong suction
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Very strong suction, serves the purpose for my useage. Just thought the extra vacuum wand to use if needed had a place on product to hold instead of placing on the side or near when not in use. Bottom line, a clean, low cost purchase to accomplish simple pickups on hardwood/tile floors, and low level carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Truth B Known

customer_reviews.title: it does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very light and, if you have the patience for cleaning the filter every time, it does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Perez Balverdi

customer_reviews.title: Good vac, but brittle (just be careful)
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this vacuum for 7 months, and I like it. Unfortunately, only a month or so in, I broke one of the wheels. It's easy to over-tug the brittle attachments when pulling them off. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: B. Labor

customer_reviews.title: It had way more suction that I thought it would have and it is very sturdy for a vacuum cleaner of their size
customer_reviews.text: This works very very well for our 32 foot motorhome. It has a long enough cord that one switch of outlet lets us do the whole motorhome. It had way more suction that I thought it would have and it is very sturdy for a vacuum cleaner of their size.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Borgstrom

customer_reviews.title: Go little vacumn go!
customer_reviews.text: I am 4 foot 10 inches and this is the size for me. For 40 bucks it sucks stuff up as well as my old Singer. It is a simple little machine that does the job!
customer_reviews.author: jerrydude

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had a rotator brush but it was cheap and had very good suction. It picks up the dog hair and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my trailer. It's worth the money. I wish it had a rotator brush but it was cheap and had very good suction. It picks up the dog hair and dirt very well
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy and Leaks
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this product, the sprayer leaked all over the floor. The rubber on the squeegee is not sturdy enough to pull the water and the suction is not strong enough to pull in the water. Horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Newbee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Thank
customer_reviews.text: Works on carpet and hard floor. So far so good! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Massey

customer_reviews.title: Was prefect for a quick clean up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to spot clean around my cat Litter box and also my bathrooms and kitchen floor. The vacuum comes apart so you can use it like a dust buster.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Expert Squared

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little vacuum ! Lightweight with a surprising amount of suction. Use it almost daily in my kitchen & hardwood floors, just perfect for that. Even works on carpet ! Glad I bough this one.
customer_reviews.author: JTBEAN

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It picks up very little not to much speed..its not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Dardon

product_meta.title: BESTEK Telescopic Window Vacuum Cleaner, Cordless Window Cleaning Rechargeable Tool Kit, with 2 Extension Telescopic Tube, Spray Bottle
feature_bullets: ✔ Clean window fast and drying effective than traditional window brush
✔ 10 to 40 Inches Extension Set can adapt to different height
✔ Cordless and lightweight, Saves effort, time, and money. Light weight and easy to use. Works indoors and outdoors
✔ 3.7V/ 12W dust filter can clean granule like coffee bean, dust, and hair
✔ Satisfaction Guaranteed: All BESTEK products come with a 30-day money-back guarantee, an 18-month warranty and a lifetime of friendly customer service!
